info.title: Change My World now API
info.description: This is the API for change my world now

get.summary: Fetch a address for a user
get.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to fetch address

delete.description: A fetch is done first to ensure the user has access to a address.  The addresses are hard deleted.

403.description: Not Authorized to delete or access address

get.summary: Fetches multiple addresses the requested user has access too
get.description: A User can request to view all addresses

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of addresses on each page

post.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to create a new address in the system

get.summary: Fetches multiple groups in the requested address
get.description: This resource allows a super user to view all the groups in a given address

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of groups on each page

get.summary: Fetches multiple games the authenticated user has access too
get.description:
A User can request all games or all the child games descending from parent.  Empty results are returned if the
user is not allowed access to a parent

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of games on each page

post.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to create a new game in the system

403.description: Not Authorized to update a game

get.description: Fetch the data for a game if the authenticated user is allowed access.

put.description:
The user must be allowed access to the game and be allowed to edit games.  403 is returned if the user is not
allowed access to update the game. 404 is returned if the game is not found or the user is not allowed access

403.description: Not Authorized to update a game

delete.description:
A fetch is done first to ensure the user has access to a game.  By default games are soft deleted unless
the "hard" parameter is set in the query.  The authenticated user will get a 403 if the they are not allowed
to hard delete a game

403.description: Not Authorized to delete or access game

get.summary: Fetches multiple groups the authenticated user has access too
get.description:
A User can request all groups or all the child groups descending from parent.  Empty results are returned if the
user is not allowed access to a parent

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Fetch all the children of this group

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of groups on each page

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Fetch groups that belong to this org

post.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to create a new group in the system

get.description: Fetch the data for a group if the authenticated user is allowed access.

put.description:
The user must be allowed access to the group and be allowed to edit groups.  403 is returned if the user is not
allowed access to update the group. 404 is returned if the group is not found or the user is not allowed access

403.description: Not Authorized to update a group

delete.description:
A fetch is done first to ensure the user has access to a group.  By default groups are soft deleted unless
the "hard" parameter is set in the query.  The authenticated user will get a 403 if the they are not allowed
to hard delete a group

403.description: Not Authorized to delete or access group

get.description:
This will fetch all organizations the user has access too.  If the user cannot fetch a list of orgaanizations
a 403 will be returned

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of organizations to list on each page

post.description: This allows a user to create an organization if they are allowed too

get.description:
Returns information about a specific organization the user has access too.  403 is thrown if the user is not
allowed to access this organization

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Id of the Organization to fetch

put.description:
A check is done to ensure the user has access to the organization in question.  A 404/403 is thrown if the user
is not allowed access or denied access to the organization

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Id of the organization to update

403.description: Not Authorized to update this organization

delete.description:
This will soft delete a organization by default unless the hard parameter is set in the query.  If the user
is not allowed to soft or hard delete, a 403 will be thrown

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: Id of the organization to delete

403.description: Not Authorized to access or delete the organization

get.summary: Fetches multiple users that the authenticated user can access
get.description: If the user is not allowed to list users a 403 is returned

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of users on each page

post.description: The Authenticated user needs permission to create a user in order to create a new user

get.description: If the authenticated user is not allowed access, than a 403 is thrown.

403.description: Not allowed to access this user

put.description:
The user to be updated is fetched first to ensure the user has access to edit the user.  All valid data for the
user is needed.

403.description: Not Authorized to update or access this user

delete.description:
The user is fetched first to ensure the authenticated user can access the user to delete.  By default users are
soft deleted unless the "hard" query parameter is set.  The authenticated user needs permission to hard delete
users

403.description: Not Authorized to delete or access user

get.summary: Fetch a game for a user
get.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to fetch a game

post.summary: Attach a game to a user
post.description: The authenticated user must be allowed to attach a game to a user in the system

delete.summary: Detach a game from a user
delete.description:
A fetch is done first to ensure the user has access to a game. The authenticated user will get a 403
if the they are not allowed to detach a game from a user

403.description: Not Authorized to detach or access game

get.summary: Fetches multiple games the requested user has access too
get.description:
A User can request all games or all the child games descending from parent.  Empty results are returned if the
user is not allowed access to a parent

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of games on each page

per_page.description: The total number of items on a page

FindLink.description: HAL Link that describes a find endpoint

templated.description: Whether this uri is templated or not

NextLink.description: HAL Link for the next page

PrevLink.description: HAL Link for the previous page

LastLink.description: HAL Link for the last page

FirstLink.description: HAL Link for the first page

SelfLink.description: HAL Link for the requested page

href.description: HREF to the the current endpoint

Address.description: Address is a geographical address of a group

AddressCollection.description: A Collection of Addresses from the API

AddressEntity.description: A Address Entity represents the address through the API

GameCollection.description: A Collection of Games from the API

GameEntity.description: A Game Entity represents the game through the API

GroupCollection.description: A Collection of Groups from the API

GroupEntity.description: A Group Entity represents the group through the API

scope.description: Binary bits the authenticated user has access for this entity

OrgCollection.description: A Collection of Organizations from the API

OrgEntity.description: An Org Entity represents the organization though the API

scope.description: Binary bits the authenticated user has access for this entity

MeEntity.description: A MeEntity represents the current authorized user in the API

_links.description: Links to resources the user has access too

UserCollection.description: A Collection of Users from the API

UserEntity.description: A UserEntity represents a user through the API

scope.description: Binary bits the authenticated user has access for this entity

UserGameCollection.description: A Collection of Games for users from the API

UserGameEntity.description: A UserGame Entity represents the game through the API

DateCreated.description: The date this entity was created

DateDeleted.description: The date this entity was deleted

DateUpdated.description: The date this entity was last updated

OuType.description: Adds a qualifier to an Organization or Group that the user can understand

Game.description: A Game represents every game in the system and details about it

game_id.description: The id of the game (usually the slug of game title)

Group.description: A Group is a node in an organization network that is used to define access to a system

head.description: The head value for this node

tail.description: The tail value for this node

depth.description: How deep this group is in the network

organization_id.description: The id of the organization this belongs too

has_children.description: Whether the group has child nodes

external_id.description: An identifier of the group in a 3rd party system (like the school)

Organization.description: An Organization represents a collection of groups

User.description: A User is able to login to the system

user_name.description: A Custom name the for the user

first_name.description: The first name of the user

middle_name.description: The middle name of the user

last_name.description: The last name of the user

external_id.description: An identifier of the user in a 3rd party system (like the school)
